anantajit.shapes

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • anantajit.shapes.Shape
      • anantajit.shapes.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends Shape
    Author:
    Anantajit

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class anantajit.shapes.Shape

        fillColor, strokeColor, x, y

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rectangle()
      Creates a Rectangle object located at (0,0), with a width of 0 and a height of 0.
      Rectangle(double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Creates a Rectangle object located at (x,y), with a width of "width" and a height of "height".

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle()
        Creates a Rectangle object located at (0,0), with a width of 0 and a height of 0. The target PApplet is set to null.

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(double x,
                 double y,
                 double width,
                 double height)
        Creates a Rectangle object located at (x,y), with a width of "width" and a height of "height". The target PApplet is set to null.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle
        y - y coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle
        width - width of the rectangle
        height - height of the rectangle

    • Method Detail

      • getPerimeter

        public double getPerimeter()
        Returns:
        double containing the perimeter of the rectangle

      • getArea

        public double getArea()
        Returns:
        double containing the area of the rectangle

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(int x,
                             int y)
        Checks if a point is located inside the rectangle. A point on the edge of the rectangle is not inside the rectangle.
        Parameters:
        x - - x coordinate of the point
        y - - y coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        boolean which is true iff the point is inside the rectangle

      • stretch

        public void stretch(double xStretch,
                    double yStretch)
        Scales the rectangle from the upper right corner of the rectangle
        Parameters:
        xStretch - the scale factor over the x-axis
        yStretch - the scale facter over the y-axis

      • scale

        public void scale(double scale)
        Scales the rectangle from the center point of the rectangle equally over the x and y axis
        Parameters:
        scale - the scale factor

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Draws the rectangle onto the PApplet
        Specified by:
        draw in class Shape
        Precondition
        All styles must be set before the draw() method is called. SetSurface must be called to assign a PApplet to which the Shape is to be drawn.
        Postcondition
        The PApplet associated with the rectangle object now contains a rectangle. The x, y, width, and height are cast to floats, so the precision will be reduced.
